content: Credit Card Bank Account OCBC 365 Card DBS Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked 2w agoCan I pay my bills for the OCBC credit card from my DBS savings account?I'm planning to get an OCBC 365 credit card but I have a DBS savings account.1 answerAnswerBump0

Grand MasterAnswered 2w agoAll the banks allow you to pay other VISA / Mastercard bills from other banks via internet banking in your bank internet banking.Do note that the payment is not immediate but it takes 1-3 working days to reach the other bank. (that is the official line, but usually, it is only 1 day)1 comment1
